item.title: Why I Chose Software Development in the AI Era
item.description:
🚀 Why I Chose Software Development in the AI Era

The answer is simple: I chose software development because of AI.

🧠 Think about it:

  • 📺 When television came, people thought it would replace 📻 radio — but it didn’t (maybe kind of).
  • 📱 When mobile phones came, people thought ☎️ landlines would disappear overnight…
  • 🎥 Then OTT platforms like Netflix and Prime Video came — and people thought traditional TV was dead.

But what really happened?
